title: Whom should we contact for fee reimbursement in Telangana for an engineering student? - Quora

response.answer_text: If every thing is fine with application process,then you need not to contact any one for fee-reimbursement. The admin staff in the engineering college itself runs the process.If there is a problem with releasing of funds,nativity issues,caste issues,mistakes while application etc…. ,then consult BC welfare office personnel at Masab tank or at Nampally exhibition ground(Hyderabad).
A.B.V.P., Vivek Bharati NO. 8,Satyanagar Flats, (Telangana) Vidyanagar,HYDERABAD - 500 044.Ph: 040-27615292  Fax-27603955
